ComicInfo.Summary:
A boy. A strange planet.
The urge to step out of the boundaries and explore. To fly. To ascend.
But what happens after ascent? What happens when you land? And what happens when you find yourself in a place where your dreams are no one's but your own?
Charlo Frade is an illustrator and writer born in Miami, Florida. In 2014 he received the Society of Illustrators Honors Award for Illustration. Goatherded is his first full length comic.
40 full colour pages, saddle stitched, 210 x 267mm.
